description: Treating people and being treated equally
Executing with precision to achieve results
Being truthful and sincere
Subject matter expertise gained through experience or study

Making a difference today with tomorrow in mind, building for succession
Willingness to take calculated risks and step outside comfort zones
Playfulness, ability to laugh and express humor appropriately

Having deep understanding, insight, and knowledge to make good judgements
Prioritizing quality and quantity time with family
Taking responsibility for both actions and outcomes
Holding a position of importance, high standing, or prestige
Fast-paced, swift, action-oriented approach
Respecting a variety of cultures and lifestyles
Valuing formality, process, and systematic approaches

Giving and receiving acknowledgement for achievements
Lack of complexity or complication, keeping things straightforward
Being physically fit and maintaining optimal well-being
Being bound emotionally or intellectually to a course of action
Looking forward to and valuing change, continuous improvement
Serving the community and non-profit organizations
Intense emotional excitement and boundless enthusiasm
Free from the influence, guidance or control of others

Balancing time and effort between work, home, and hobbies
